dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.control.RevenueAssuranceControl
dataStructure.description:
A Policy-based rule that represents the logical definition of comparisons performed on entities, such as CustomerBills and CallDetailRecords, to identify RevenueAssuranceViolations.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceControl

child.name: revenueAssuranceKPI
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association RevenueAssuranceControlMayBeUsedAs

This association end is optional
child.label: revenueAssuranceKPI
